attributes.action:
Bring into law payment terms for business are 
30 days from receipt of invoice.
attributes.background:
This would bring confidence to all businesses.
Helping them to plan their way forward.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about terms and conditions for particular businesses, including the period in which goods and services need to be paid for, are a matter for individual businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.
